title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 carries the best update policy in Android tablets from $699
content:
Android tablets seemingly have a renewed focus inside of Google, but it’s Samsung that has been leading the effort for the past few years. Today, alongside the Galaxy S22 series, Samsung is launching the Galaxy Tab S8, Tab S8+, and massive Tab S8 Ultra. Here’s what you need to know.

more…

The post Samsung Galaxy Tab S8 carries the best update policy in Android tablets from $699 appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Samsung just unveiled the Galaxy Tab S8 series with a starting price of $699 and the best update policy for any Android tablet.
